title: General Grant National Memorial: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours         Both figures hold emblems used in war. NPS   School Visits Educators may request ranger-guided tours. These tours must be reserved and confirmed in advance. Please click on the 'For Teachers' link on the left for more information.   Â    Group Tours Ranger-guided group tours, for groups of 10 or more persons, are subject to availability and must be reserved and confirmed in advance. Please submit a request form for consideration.
